name: Stunts Contest Beach Edition
description:
Sea, sun, beautiful girls... What else do you need?

The time has come when we can combine useful with pleasant. Stunts Contest: Beach Edition is a racing game where as motorcycle driver you will need to pass every mission on these beautiful beaches. You can't hide something like that from people's eyes.

Get behind the wheel of a powerful motorcycle right now to perform the most spectacular stunts. Start with the smallest challenges, because you may not face the most dangerous ones. If you feel ready to conquer the looks of the beach, join us right now!

Game Features :
- 10 levels
- The motorcycle with a gasoline combustion engine
- Limited fuel
